references.reason: This paper introduces GPT-4, a large vision-language model (LVLMs) that is used as a reward model in the Free²Guide framework.

references.paper_title: Training diffusion models with reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it explores reinforcement learning methods for training diffusion models, a technique that is contrasted and improved upon by the gradient-free approach in Free²Guide.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This foundational paper demonstrates the effectiveness of diffusion models in image generation, providing context for the paper's focus on extending such models to video generation.
This paper is cited as a seminal work in diffusion models, establishing the theoretical groundwork for many of the techniques used in text-to-video generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper focuses on high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, providing a direct comparison for the video generation tasks addressed in Free²Guide.
